channel.title: My customs not working
channel.description: Okay, well, this may sound noobish, but I really don't use models. This got interesting however. So, I made a client based on OldkoScape. Now, I'm using an Allstar-Scape base server. So, Oldkoscape Client, Allstar server. I want to use the oldkoscape models with my server. but when I go to wield something like an Admin Platebosy, it comes out wielded as a weapon and it looks corrupted. I can use the OldkoScape client with the Oldkoscape server. I head somethings about using the item2.java or something along the lines of that to make the custom items work. If someone can tell me more on what to do, I'll greatly appreciate it. :P

item.title: My customs not working
item.dc:creator: @Darkning Darkning
item.description:
@Darkning wrote:

you need to add the ints to your class8.java in your clients folders.

you need to add the platebody inder the integer for plate bodies in your item class in your source files.

Read full topic

item.title: My customs not working
item.dc:creator: @DCScape DCScape
item.description:
@DCScape wrote:

Okay, well, this may sound noobish, but I really don’t use models. This got interesting however. So, I made a client based on OldkoScape. Now, I’m using an Allstar-Scape base server. So, Oldkoscape Client, Allstar server. I want to use the oldkoscape models with my server. but when I go to wield something like an Admin Platebosy, it comes out wielded as a weapon and it looks corrupted. I can use the OldkoScape client with the Oldkoscape server. I head somethings about using the item2.java or something along the lines of that to make the custom items work. If someone can tell me more on what to do, I’ll greatly appreciate it.
